input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Malware Detected on Kodak Scanner

I am contacting you to report a malware alert generated by my Kodak scanner. Malwarebytes flagged it due to my outdated macOS My name is Liu Wei.. I have already tried restarting the scanner and updating Malwarebytes, yet the problem remains unresolved. I would greatly appreciate your support in addressing this issue and ensuring the security of my scanner. You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.
